metadata.dc:author: Castro, Juan Durán
metadata.dc:description: The author describes an operating guideline for local treatment in cases dealing with sternum surgery as part of bypass surgery and saphenous vein surgery in a post-anesthesia recuperation ward for patients having cardiac problems, trying to prevent and reduce the distinct local complications which can occur such as infection or dehiscence of a wound.
metadata.dc:title: Cuidados de heridas quirúrgicas en pacientes someticos a by-pass coronario esternotomía y safenectomía.
[Sternum surgery as part of bypass surgery and saphenous vein surgery].
